p: The obtained hybrid emulsion-based films exhibit characteristic bands associated with the isolated MgO–H stretching at 3690 cm −1, stretching of structural –OH at 3661 cm −1. Between 3650 and 3050 cm −1 a broad band is present, due to the fact that many specific bands of the components are overlapping, which can be associated with the stretching vibrations of –OH groups of interlayer water from C30B, N–H stretching and hydroxyl –OH stretching [ 36, 39, 40].
